Online hearings necessary to improve court transparency: NA deputies

Hà Nội – Organising online court hearings is a breakthrough solution to improve the transparency of court proceedings, National Assembly (NA) deputies agreed on Sunday.
Politics & Laws

Online hearings necessary to improve court transparency: NA deputies

Hà Nội – Organising online court hearings is a breakthrough solution to improve the transparency of court proceedings, National Assembly (NA) deputies agreed on Sunday.
